content.name: Generic

fields.name: What is it?
fields.content:
Droptop Four is a popular dropdown app launcher for Windows & Rainmeter.
It is available in two variants, a `Basic` one, free, and a `Supporter` one, with a \'pay what you want\' donation.
Both variants have 14 system tray apps, the Always Show option to make it accessible everywhere on top of your desktop and a lot more.

fields.name: Basic Variant
fields.content:
The `Basic` variant has:
 - 7 home bottons icons
 - 6 fully-customizable toolbars
 - 4 themes to choose from

fields.name: Supporter Variant
fields.content:
The `Supporter` variant has:
 - 300 home buttons icons
 - 12 fully-customizable toolbars
 - 22 themes to choose from

content.footer: To see further infos on one of the two variants type `/info Basic` or `/info Supporter` or click the buttons below

content.name: Basic

fields.name: What is it?
fields.content: This is the Basic and free variant of droptop.

fields.name: Perks
fields.content:
The `Basic` variant has:
 - 7 home bottons icons
 - 6 fully-customizable toolbars
 - 4 themes to choose from

fields.name: Download
fields.content:
To install it you have to download it on the [Droptop Four website](https://droptop-four.github.io/download)
To see further explanations on download methods type `/download Basic`

content.footer: To see further infos on one of the two variants type `/info Basic` or `/info Supporter` or click the buttons below

content.name: Supporter

fields.name: What is it?
fields.content:
This is the Supporter variant of droptop.
To download it you can pay what you want through Gumroad.

fields.name: Perks
fields.content:
The `Supporter` variant has:
 - 300 home buttons icons
 - 12 fully-customizable toolbars
 - 22 themes to choose from

fields.name: Download
fields.content:
To install it you have to:
1) download the Basic variant on the [Droptop Four website](https://droptop-four.github.io/download)
2) download the Supporter update through [Gumroad](https://gumroad.com/l/droptop) choosing how much you want to pay for it (recommended $6).
To see further explanations on download methods type `/download Supporter`

content.footer: To see further infos on one of the two variants type `/info Basic` or `/info Supporter` or click the buttons below

content.name: Generic

fields.name: Basic variant
fields.content: The Droptop **Basic** variant can be downloaded on [GitHub](https://github.com/Droptop-Four/Basic-Version/releases/). To see further informations about the Basic variant type `/info Basic`.

fields.name: Supporter variant
fields.content: The Droptop **Supporter** variant can be downloaded after paying what you want on [Gumroad](https://gumroad.com/l/droptop). To see further informations about the Supporter variant type `/info Supporter`.

content.footer: To see further infos on one of the two variants type `/info Basic` or `/info Supporter` or click the buttons below

content.name: Generic

fields.name: Where to update?
fields.content: Droptop should automatically detect new updates in the last row of the Droptop home menu. You can also find the Update for Droptop on [Github](https://github.com/Droptop-Four/Update/releases/latest).

content.footer: To see further infos on one of the two variants type `/info Basic` or `/info Supporter`

fields.name: Where do I find the FAQs?
fields.content: You can find the FAQ at https://droptop-four.github.io/faq/
